_source.text: After he had gotten into this proud condition he probably thought that he could do better than God; and in his endeavor to show what he could do, he brought his own downfall and brought the human family into sin and death.

text: ; and in his endeavor to **show** what he could do, he brought his own **downfall** and brought the human family into sin and **death**.
After he had gotten into this proud condition he probably thought that he could do **better** **than** God
